channel.title: Need help, im new. sort've
channel.description: [i][b]hey guys, i've got runesources' source, and client. but i dont know what to do next. i dont need to portforward yet. i just need to know how to get the client to load, i don't know what to do. cheers[/b][/i] :(

item.title: Need help, im new. sort've
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_0wnag33 Pur3_0wnag33
item.description:
@Pur3_0wnag33 wrote:

i’ve owned a paldino 562, and ive coded it. i can handle it, this one will be easier.

can you jsut explain, why it wont load??

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, im new. sort've
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well, If you can’t figure that out, I recommend using a starting base, to gain knowledge of RSPS’s before you decide to take up a bigger project than you can handle.
Those PI’s with 602 anims and such always look better than they actually are.
They all have problems.
Please Don’t conform to all the leeching wanna be 634’s please :{

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, im new. sort've
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

Pur3_0wnag33:

i get all that, ive run the .bat, execpt when i try to load the client, it goes as far as : connected to update server, and wont load further.

did you put the cache in your C: Drive if it has one?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, im new. sort've
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

i wouldnt call this help at all? find the cache folder and put it in your C: drive. After that click run.bat in your source folder, then go to your client folder and click run.bat… then your on your server… if you want to make your self owner, log in, log out. go to your source folder, then data, then characters, find your username. Then you will find something like player rights=0… change that 0 to a 3 and then your owner

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, im new. sort've
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

In the source and client you should see something that says “run.bat” or something along the lines of that. First run the server’s .bat then run the clients .bat

Read full topic
